title: Interview: #MeToo Hits Elite Sports
description: It's Tuesday: Sam talks to speed skater Bridie Farrell. Her mentor, former Olympian Andy Gabel, sexually abused her when she was a teenager. Sam also talks to journalist Alexandra Starr about the unique ways elite sports can groom children to be victims of abuse.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: It's Tuesday: Sam talks to speed skater Bridie Farrell and journalist Alexandra Starr about the #MeToo movement in sports.
